description:
The Ikoni Trail 1.0 lets you tackle any adventure off-road. Mid-cushioned AeroFoam Trail combined with the 5mm results in underfoot protection while still having a solid ground feel. The unique Ascending Fulcrum cradles the foot and propels you forward for an efficient ride on the flats, up- and down-hill.

  • Ideal Knit seamless mesh uppers balance durability and breathability
  • Midfoot snag strap for keeping laces tied and free from catching
  • Ascending fulcrum, rockered shape for a smooth, efficient ride that cradles and propels the foot when climbing and descending
  • Asymmetrical forefoot lace for adjustments on the fly
  • Integrated Toe Bumper for protection from roots and rocks
  • Specialized M-lugs & T-lugs provide traction on the uphill, downhill, wet, and dry
name: Karhu Ikoni Trail 1.0 Trail Running Shoes - Women's
